sent.orig: CHAPTER V PRODUCTION AND SALE OF CIGARETTE PAPER, FILTER ROD, CIGARETTE TOW AND CIGARETTE MANUFACTURING EQUIPMENT.
sent.trans: 第五章卷烟纸、滤嘴棒、烟用丝束、烟草专用机械的生产和销售。

sent.orig: The cigarette industry began in the 1870s with the development of the cigarette manufacturing machine.
sent.trans: 随着制烟机的发展，卷烟工业在19世纪和70年代开始出现。

sent.orig: An electronic cigarette exhibiting another common design, that of an ordinary cigarette.
sent.trans: 一种电子香烟展示其普通香烟的设计。

sent.orig: The Cigarette-Smoking Man stubs out his cigarette.
sent.trans: 那个吸烟的人熄掉了他的烟头。

sent.orig: The electronic cigarette looks and feels a tobacco cigarette, but that is where the similarities end.
sent.trans: 电子卷烟看起来和感觉像烟，但是那只是相似的部分。
